test.doc:
Forcing signature in reservations created by Admin
Scenario: Admin create a booking (normal, contract, group) Given Admin creates a booking When it comes to confimration page Then no web element (textbox, labels,..) related to forcing signature is shown
Scenario: Reservation done by normal users then edited by Admin Given Normal user completed a reservation And Normal user hasn't signed And Admin edits the booking And reservation is confirmed When it comes to confirmation page Then no web element (textbox, labels,..) related to forcing signature is shown
test.status: Element count for selector `//button[normalize-space()='Save']` is '0' (int) should be '1.0' (float)
